definition: lit. a pearl in the palm (idiom)/fig. beloved person (esp. daughter)
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Mr Grant dotes on his granddaughter. She's the apple of his eye.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特先生很溺爱他的小孙女，她是他的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Slender, pretty and vivacious, she was the apple of her parents' eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她苗条美丽，活泼大方，是父母的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Oh, your room is in apple-pie order.
He is the apple of our eye.
sentences.chinese: 他是全家人的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: He kept it as the apple of his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子是他爸爸的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: I am the apple of my grandma‘s eye.
He is looked after by my mother. He is the apple of our eye.
sentences.chinese: 我儿子由我母亲照料，他是全家的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Leny is the apple of her mather's eye .
sentences.chinese: 珍妮丝是他妈妈的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: She was the top student in English II, (10)the apple of Mrs. Larrivee's eye.
sentences.chinese: 她是英语二班的尖子，拉里维太太的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Jeny is the apple of her mather's eye.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮丝是她妈妈的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Meg is the apple of her father's eye .
sentences.chinese: 美格是她爸爸的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Every child is the apple in their parents eyes.
sentences.chinese: 每一个孩子都是父母的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: I think each child must be the apple of her parents' eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我想，每个孩子都必定是父母的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: His youngest daughter is the apple of his eye.
sentences.chinese: 他的小女儿是他的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: LIng Ling is the apple of her grandpa‘s eye.
sentences.chinese: 玲玲是她爷爷的掌上明珠。

sentences.english: Eg. He is looked after by my mother. He is the apple of our eye.
sentences.chinese: 我儿子由我母亲照料，他是全家的掌上明珠。

definition: precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
(of a child) apple of one's eye
thousand jin 斤 (pounds) of gold/money and riches/(honorific) invaluable (support)/(honorific) daughter
lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
